findings.title: Transfer ownership to Time-lock contract with reasonable latency
findings.description: Transfer ownership to a Time-lock contract with a reasonable latency (e.g., 24 hours) so the community may react to changes.

findings.title: Transfer ownership to a multi-signature wallet, to prevent a single point of failure
findings.description: Preventing single point of failure by transferring ownership to a multi-signature wallet.

findings.title: Transfer ownership to DAO
findings.description: Transfer ownership to DAO so the community could decide whether the privileged operations should be executed by voting.
